goals__remit: ZAY Strategy is a business strategy consulting firm with a proven expertise in public affairs. ZAY Strategy supports firms and business organizations through strategic communications tools, by providing tactical input for business and investment strategy. We offer public affairs and strategic communication advice in a wide range of sectors, including Chemicals, Retail, Transport, digital, car, food and tourism industries.
